root.name: Caltron 6-in-1
root.description: The GamesÂ Cosmos Cop: A Space Harrier type of game where you play as a cosmos cop... that tries to stop the invading terror legion..Magic Carpet 1001: Horizontal shmup that was later released on pirate cartridges as Aladdin III and later modified and released as Super Harry Potter.Balloon Monster: A Buster Bros\Pang like gameAdam and Eve: A game where you awkwardly try to kill balloon riding snakes.Porter: A puzzle game where you have to move boxes, very much like Boxxle.Bookyman: A clone of the game Crush Roller.
